item.description:
Join us for good conversation and great Portuguese food! Come even if you can't RSVP - I can't check who's coming the day of the event anyhow.

Of course, if you get our newsletter, you knew about this two months in advance. Email me your snailmail address and I'll make sure you get the newsletter on paper!

For more information about our group:
http://www.cthumanist...

BTW, this will be our last visit to Lisboa before their annual vacation, so be sure to stock up on great Portuguese cuisine while you still can!

For more information, see http://www.cthumanist...
item.name: The Humanist Association of Connecticut Waterbury Area Social Dinner
